audioText: L'ingénieur sensible a bougé le capteur de trois millimètres pour améliorer la mesure de température.
question: How much did the engineer move the sensor?
options: Three millimeters to improve the temperature measurement
Five centimeters to fix the calibration error
One meter to avoid interference from nearby equipment
Half an inch to align with the new specifications
explanation: The text states 'L'ingénieur sensible a bougé le capteur de trois millimètres pour améliorer la mesure de température' - The sensitive engineer moved the sensor three millimeters to improve the temperature measurement. 'Bougé' is the past participle of 'bouger' (to move).
